column4: so hey.  I have a 133mg cpu with 64 megs of ram sitting around.  can i put lubuntu on that?
i wouldn't if 133mg was meant to be 133mhz
if the processor is i586 use crux if i686 use arch, you WILL need to tailor your OS to get any performance out of it. if i386 use ubuntu server/debian and do it from the base up
